scripts.build:packages: npm run build --workspace=@mlut/core && npm run build --workspace=mlut && npx gulp -f gulpfile.cjs sass && npm run build --workspace=@mlut/plugins
scripts.build:docs: npm run build --workspace=@mlut/core && npx gulp -f gulpfile.cjs sass-mk-doc
scripts.build:mlut: npm run build --workspace=mlut && npx gulp -f gulpfile.cjs sass
scripts.test:plugins: vite build -c test/plugins/vite/vite.config.js && webpack -c test/plugins/webpack/webpack.config.js && rollup --config test/plugins/rollup/rollup.config.js
scripts.lint: npx eslint packages/*/src/ && npx stylelint packages/core/src/sass --ip packages/core/src/sass/tools/mixins/base/_mk-ar.scss
